Rampage: As soon as we have breached the arks hull we must destroy the island's central power system then when it is destroyed, whoever destroyed it must call an evac. You will he is speaking the truth if you here an explosion. Otherwise it is a traitor speaking. Return to the base after the attack and await further orders from Hell beast. 
The attack will commense at 16:30 hours.
